data.comment: The whistle has gone to start the match.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 2, Corner awarded to Dallas.
Jair Marrufo signals a throw-in for Houston, close to Dallas's area.
Ball safe as Dallas is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 5, Throw-in for Dallas at Toyota Stadium.
Houston awarded a free kick in their own half.
Dallas awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 8, Dallas to take a throw-in in Houston territory.
Houston have a goal kick.
In Frisco, Dallas push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
In the minute 11, It's a goal kick for the away team in Frisco.
Jair Marrufo signals a Dallas throw-in in Houston's half.
Jair Marrufo awards Houston a goal kick.
In the minute 14, Dallas have been awarded a corner by Jair Marrufo.
Ryan Hollingshead (Dallas) goes close with a header but the ball is scrambled away by Houston defenders.
In Frisco Houston attack through Ariel Lassiter. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 15, Ball goes out of play for a Dallas goal kick.
Throw-in Houston.
Dallas's Franco Jara is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 18, Throw-in for Dallas close to the penalty box.
Franco Jara puts the ball in the net and the home team now lead 1-0.
That's a fine assist from Michael Barrios.
In the minute 22, Darwin Quintero (Houston) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
Goal kick for Dallas at Toyota Stadium.
Jose Bizama is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
In the minute 24, Jose Bizama returns to the field for Houston after picking up a slight injury.
In Frisco a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Dallas drive upfield and Michael Barrios gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Houston defender.
In the minute 26, Throw-in for Dallas in their own half.
Goal! Fafa Picault extends Dallas's lead to 2-0 in Frisco with a header.
Great play from Andres Ricaurte to set up the goal.
In the minute 28, Free kick for Dallas in their own half.
Jair Marrufo awards the away team a throw-in.
Houston needs to be cautious. Dallas have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 29, Ball safe as Houston is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Dallas in the half of Houston.
Houston pushes forward through Ariel Lassiter, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 30, Corner awarded to Houston.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Frisco.
Throw-in for Dallas in their own half.
In the minute 32, Jair Marrufo signals a free kick to Dallas in their own half.
Houston awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Dallas at Toyota Stadium.
In the minute 34, Jair Marrufo signals a free kick to Houston in their own half.
Tab Ramos is making the team's first substitution at Toyota Stadium with Memo Rodriguez replacing Niko Hansen.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Frisco to check on Thiago Santos, who is grimacing with pain.
In the minute 38, Thiago Santos for Dallas is back on the field again.
Houston have been awarded a corner by Jair Marrufo.
Dallas awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 41, Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Bryan Reynolds for Dallas who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
Free kick for Houston in the half of Dallas.
Darwin Quintero (Houston) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
In the minute 43, Dallas have a goal kick.
Goal kick for Dallas at Toyota Stadium.
Bryan Reynolds, who was grimacing earlier, has been substituted. John Nelson is the substitute for Dallas.
In the minute 45, Houston have been awarded a corner by Jair Marrufo.
The 1st half is prolonged by 4 minutes of added time.
Jair Marrufo signals a free kick to Dallas.
Throw-in Houston.
Jair Marrufo awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 45, Can Dallas get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Houston's half?
The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
In the minute 45, At Toyota Stadium, Jose Bizama has been yellow-carded for the away team.
The second-half is underway in Frisco.
In the minute 46, Jair Marrufo signals a Dallas throw-in in Houston's half.
Houston awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Andres Ricaurte of Dallas smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 49, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Houston drives forward and Ariel Lassiter gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Houston to take a throw-in in Dallas territory.
In the minute 51, Dallas's Franco Jara misses with an attempt on goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Houston goal kick.
Corner awarded to Houston.
In the minute 54, Houston are coming forward and Darwin Ceren gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Corner awarded to Houston.
Free kick for Dallas in their own half.
In the minute 55, Throw-in for Dallas in the half of Houston.
Free kick Dallas.
Wilfried Zahibo (Houston) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 56, Houston awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ball safe as Dallas is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Houston have been awarded a corner by Jair Marrufo.
In the minute 58, Houston have been awarded a corner by Jair Marrufo.
Jair Marrufo awards Dallas a goal kick.
Dallas make their second substitution with Tanner Tessmann replacing Jesus Ferreira.
In the minute 60, Throw-in for Dallas at Toyota Stadium.
Corner awarded to Houston.
Throw-in Dallas.
In the minute 62, Can Houston get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Dallas's half?
Throw-in for Dallas in their own half.
The away team have replaced Ariel Lassiter with Tomas Martinez. This is the second substitution made today by Tab Ramos.
Jair Marrufo awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 63, Tab Ramos (Houston) is making a third substitution, with Mauro Manotas replacing Christian Ramirez.
Boniek Garcia is replacing Wilfried Zahibo for Houston at Toyota Stadium.
In the minute 64, Free kick for Houston in their own half.
Jair Marrufo signals a free kick to Dallas in their own half.
Franco Jara of Dallas is pulled up for offside.
In the minute 67, Andres Ricaurte for Dallas gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Jair Marrufo awards Houston a goal kick.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 69, Free kick Houston.
Thiago Santos (Dallas) gets a yellow card.
Houston push upfield and Tomas Martinez gets his head to the ball. The attempt is cleared by an alert Dallas defence.
In the minute 71, Dallas pushes forward through Andres Ricaurte, whose finish on goal is saved.
Dallas have been awarded a corner by Jair Marrufo.
Dallas's Andres Ricaurte breaks free at Toyota Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 72, Houston have a goal kick.
Houston's Boniek Garcia gets his shot away but it misses the target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Frisco.
In the minute 74, Tanner Tessmann of Dallas gets in a strike, but is off target.
Goal kick for Houston at Toyota Stadium.
Harold Mosquera is replacing Franco Jara for Dallas at Toyota Stadium.
In the minute 75, The home team replace Michael Barrios with Reto Ziegler.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Dallas close to the penalty box.
Ball goes out of play for a Houston goal kick.
In the minute 78, Ball goes out of play for a Dallas goal kick.
Jair Marrufo signals a free kick to Dallas in their own half.
Goal kick for Dallas at Toyota Stadium.
In the minute 83, Jair Marrufo signals a Dallas throw-in in Houston's half.
Ball safe as Houston is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Harold Mosquera for Dallas drives towards goal at Toyota Stadium. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 84, Throw-in high up the field for Houston in Frisco.
Dallas awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Dallas in the half of Houston.
In the minute 87, Throw-in for Houston in the half of Dallas.
Tab Ramos is making the team's fifth substitution at Toyota Stadium with Marcelo Palomino replacing Darwin Ceren.
Free kick for Dallas in their own half.
In the minute 89, It's a goal kick for the home team in Frisco.
Jair Marrufo awards the away team a throw-in.
3 minutes will be added to the 2nd half in Frisco.
In Frisco Houston attack through Darwin Quintero. The finish is off target, however.
Jair Marrufo awards Dallas a goal kick.
Free kick for Houston in their own half.
Houston to take a throw-in in Dallas territory.
Jair Marrufo blows to end the match. The final score is 3-0.
Goal! Dallas extend their lead to 3-0 through Fafa Picault.
Fafa Picault for Dallas has been booked by Jair Marrufo and receives a first yellow card.
